sidebar.title: My Portfolio
projects.descriptionG: I love programming. I program every day, and a way to justify it is through building personal projects
me.me: I am a developer, a 18 year old young man from Argentina, with current knowledge in the stack mern but who keeps learning new technologies languages and programming fundaments ​​every day.
me.myinterest: Besides writing and studying code, I like to read books on personal development, finance, and physics, at the same time I go swimming. The mind follows the body and the body follows the mind.
